question:
You arranged to visit a friend abroad but an important event at home has forced you to change the dates of your visit.
Write a letter to your friend. In your letter
explain the importance of the event
apologize for the situation
suggest a new arrangement
text: I hope you have been keeping well. It's been too long since we last met and that is why I was eagerly waiting to see you. But sadly, I am writing to let you know that I have to cancel my trip to England on 10th July 2022.

As you were aware that my elder sister's marriage is in August, but my brother-in-law got new job in Canada and he has to join next month. So, our families decided to pre-pone the marriage and fix for the coming weekend. Therefore, it is impossible for me to miss the ceremony and visit you.

Though, I am sure that you will understand this scenario, still, I am very sorry for the trouble caused to you. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience and would be grateful if you could change the date of your leaves because I am now thinking of visiting next month. If, it suits you, could you please reply me soon, so, I can book my tickets in advance.
I look forward to meeting you soon.

error_list.error_des: The noun phrase new job seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
It seems that there is a pronoun problem here.
It appears that you have an unnecessary comma after the subordinating conjunction Though. Consider removing the comma.
It seems that preposition use may be incorrect here.
Consider using a question mark to signify that this sentence is a question.
